title: Managing COP with Sensor Outage
description: A key long-range radar goes offline, creating a gap in the Common Operating Picture. An operator must mitigate the gap.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the radar outage alert and identify the resulting coverage gap on the COP.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator correctly identifies the location and size of the sensor gap.

tasks.description: Query for any available assets (e.g., naval ship, AWACS aircraft) that can be moved to cover the gap.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator identifies a nearby AWACS aircraft that can be re-tasked.

tasks.description: Request the AWACS aircraft to move into a new orbit to provide radar coverage of the gap and feed its data into the COP.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator successfully mitigates the sensor gap, restoring the integrity of the COP.
